questions.question: What is the name of the island where Fortnite Battle Royale takes place?
questions.explanation: Fortnite Battle Royale takes place on Fortnite Island, a virtual island where players fight against each other until only one is left standing.

questions.question: Which in-game item provides temporary health and shield points?
questions.explanation: Slurp Juice is an in-game item in Fortnite that provides both health and shield points when consumed. It grants 25 health or shield points over time.

questions.question: True or False: Fortnite Battle Royale has a building mechanic.
questions.explanation: True. Fortnite Battle Royale features a unique building mechanic that allows players to construct various structures using gathered materials like wood, stone, and metal.

questions.question: Which of the following is not a playable mode in Fortnite?
questions.explanation: Trios is not a permanent playable mode in Fortnite. However, it may be available during limited-time events or special game modes.

questions.question: What is the rarest type of item in Fortnite?
questions.explanation: Legendary items are the rarest and most powerful items in Fortnite. They are denoted by their orange color and often have unique abilities or superior stats.

questions.question: Who is the main antagonist in Fortnite's storyline?
questions.explanation: The Foundation, also known as Agent Jonesy, is the main antagonist in Fortnite's storyline. He is the leader of the Imagined Order (IO) and plays a significant role in the island's events.

questions.question: Which location in Fortnite is known for its distinctive clock tower?
questions.explanation: Tilted Towers was a popular location in Fortnite known for its distinctive clock tower. It was a high-density area often favored by players due to the abundance of loot.

questions.question: Which weapon category includes shotguns and assault rifles in Fortnite?
questions.explanation: Shotguns and assault rifles fall under the close-range weapons category in Fortnite. They are commonly used for close to medium-range combat.

questions.question: True or False: Fortnite offers cross-platform play between different gaming systems.
questions.explanation: True. Fortnite supports cross-platform play, allowing players on different gaming systems such as PC, consoles (Xbox, PlayStation), and mobile devices to play together.

questions.question: What is the name of the Fortnite in-game currency used for purchasing cosmetic items?
questions.explanation: V-Bucks is the in-game currency used in Fortnite for purchasing cosmetic items such as skins, emotes, and gliders. It can be obtained through gameplay or purchased with real money.

questions.question: Which season of Fortnite introduced the concept of NPCs (Non-Player Characters) on the island?
questions.explanation: Season 5 of Fortnite introduced NPCs on the island, allowing players to interact with AI-controlled characters who offer quests, services, and items.

questions.question: Which Fortnite location was transformed into a futuristic city called Neo Tilted?
questions.explanation: Tilted Towers underwent a transformation and became Neo Tilted in Fortnite. It featured a futuristic cityscape with advanced technology and new buildings.

questions.question: True or False: Fortnite hosts regular in-game live events that change the island's landscape and introduce new gameplay elements.
questions.explanation: True. Fortnite is known for its live events, which occur within the game and often involve special cinematic experiences, in-game concerts, and dramatic changes to the island.

questions.question: What is the name of the mysterious cube that appeared in Fortnite?
questions.explanation: Kevin the Cube was the name given to the mysterious purple cube that appeared in Fortnite. It had a significant impact on the island's events during the game's storyline.

questions.question: Which Fortnite game mode allows players to team up against hordes of AI-controlled enemies?
questions.explanation: Save the World is a cooperative player-versus-environment (PvE) mode in Fortnite where players team up to fight against hordes of AI-controlled enemies. It is separate from the Battle Royale mode.
